description:
When space is at a premium, this side release bottle cage will help keep you hydrated, without having to resort to a hydration pack.

  • Side release design needs less room, great for smaller frames, full-suspension bikes, and bikes with frame bags
  • Supportive skeletonized frame holds your bottle securely
  • Fiber-reinforced composite is light and strong
  • Large side opening makes grabbing and returning your bottle easy
name: Lezyne Flow Black Right-Side Load Bottle Cage
